name: My Nintendo Picross: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
name_original: My Nintendo Picross: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
description: My Nintendo Picross: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess is a downloadable puzzle game for the Nintendo 3DS. It is a Picross-based puzzle spin-off game, also known as a nonogram, with a theme based on Twilight Princess.
